lead_paragraph: Edmonton signed goaltender Mathieu Garon, an unrestricted free agent, to a two-year contract. Garon was 13-10-6 with Los Angeles last season, with a 2.66 goals-against average and .907 save percentage. The Oilers were looking for a new backup to Dwayne Roloson after deciding not to re-sign Jussi Markkanen.
